title: V/H/S/94
director: Simon Barrett, Steven Kostanski, Chloe Okuno
writer: Jennifer Reeder, Chloe Okuno, Simon Barrett
actors: Anna Hopkins, Christian Potenza, Brian Paul
plot: A police S.W.A.T. team investigate a mysterious VHS tape and discover a sinister cult that has pre-recorded material which uncovers a nightmarish conspiracy.
